com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase
Class HBaseClientTemplate

java.lang.Object
  com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase.HBaseClientTemplate

public class HBaseClientTemplate
extends Object

This class simplifies the use of HBase client, and helps to avoid common errors by managing its own cleanup of resources. This class uses the Template Method pattern to allow users to implement callbacks for things like entity mapping, and get and put modification (modify Get and Put before sending them off to HBase).

HBaseClientTemplate

public HBaseClientTemplate(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTablePool pool,
                           String tableName)
Construct an HBaseClientTemplate. Requires an HTablePool to acquire HBase connections from, and the name of the table to interact with.

Parameters:
pool - The pool of HBase connections.
tableName - The name of the table to interact with.

HBaseClientTemplate

public HBaseClientTemplate(HBaseClientTemplate clientTemplate)
Creates a client template that is a copy of an existing client template.

Parameters:
clientTemplate -
Method Detail

registerGetModifier

public void registerGetModifier(GetModifier getModifier)
Register a GetModifier to be called before every Get is executed on HBase. Multiple GetModifiers can be registered by invoking this function multiple times. GetModifiers will be called in the order they are added to the template, so if any modifier is destructive, it must be added in the right order.

Parameters:
getModifier - The GetModifier to register.

registerPutActionModifier

public void registerPutActionModifier(PutActionModifier putActionModifier)
Register a PutActionModifier to be called before every Put is executed on HBase. Multiple PutActionModifiers can be registered by invoking this function multiple times. PutActionModifiers will be called in the order they are added to the template, so if any modifier is destructive, it must be added in the right order.

Parameters:
putActionModifier - The PutActionModifier to register.

registerUniquePutActionModifier

public void registerUniquePutActionModifier(PutActionModifier putActionModifier)
Registers a PutActionModifier to be called before every Put, if the given modifier is not already registered. This allows the user to prevent adding the same modifier multiple times.

Parameters:
putActionModifier -

countPutActionModifiers

public int countPutActionModifiers()

registerDeleteModifier

public void registerDeleteModifier(DeleteActionModifier deleteActionModifier)
Register a DeleteActionModifier to be called before every Delete is executed on HBase. Multiple DeleteActionModifiers can be registered by invoking this function multiple times. DeleteActionModifiers will be called in the order they are added to the template, so if any modifier is destructive, it must be added in the right order.

Parameters:
deleteActionModifier - The DeleteActionModifier to register.

registerScanModifier

public void registerScanModifier(ScanModifier scanModifier)
Register a ScanModifier to be called before every Scan is executed on HBase. Multiple ScanModifiers can be registered by invoking this function multiple times. ScanModifiers will be called in the order they are added to the template, so if any modifier is destructive, it must be added in the right order.

Parameters:
scanModifier - The ScanModifier to register.

get

public org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result get(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Get get)
Execute a Get on HBase. Any GetModifers registered with registerGetModifier will be invoked before the Get is executed.

Parameters:
get - The Get to execute
Returns:
Result returned from the Get.

get

public org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result get(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Get get,
                                                 GetModifier getModifier)
Execute the get on HBase, invoking the getModifier before executing the get if getModifier is not null. Any GetModifers registered with registerGetModifier will be invoked before the Get is executed, and after the getModifier passed to this function are called.

Parameters:
get - The Get to execute.
getModifier - Invoked before the Get to give callers a chance to modify the Get before it is executed.
Returns:
Result returned from the Get.

get

public <K,E> E get(K key,
                   EntityMapper<K,E> entityMapper)
Execute a Get on HBase, creating the Get from the key's toByteArray method. The returned Result of the Get will be mapped to an entity with the entityMapper, and that entity will be returned. Any GetModifers registered with registerGetModifier will be invoked before the Get is executed.

Parameters:
key - The Key to create a Get from.
entityMapper - The EntityMapper to use to map the Result to an entity to return.
Returns:
The entity created by the entityMapper.

get

public <K,E> E get(K key,
                   GetModifier getModifier,
                   EntityMapper<K,E> entityMapper)
Execute a Get on HBase, creating the Get from the key's toByteArray method. The returned Result of the Get will be mapped to an entity with the entityMapper, and that entity will be returned. If the getModifier is not null, it will be invoked before the created Get is executed. Any GetModifers registered with registerGetModifier will be invoked after the getModifier passed to this method is invoked, and before the Get is executed.

Parameters:
key - The Key to create a Get from.
getModifier - Invoked before the Get to give callers a chance to modify the Get before it is executed.
entityMapper - The EntityMapper to use to map the Result to an entity to return.
Returns:
The entity created by the entityMapper.

put

public boolean put(PutAction putAction)
Execute a Put on HBase. Any PutModifers registered with registerPutModifier will be invoked before the Put is executed.

Parameters:
putAction - The put to execute on HBase.
Returns:
True if the put succeeded, False if the put failed due to update conflict

put

public boolean put(PutAction putAction,
                   org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.HTableInterface table)
Execute a Put on HBase using a pre-define HTableInterface Any PutModifers registered with registerPutModifier will be invoked before the Put is executed.

Parameters:
putAction - The put to execute on HBase.
table - The HTableInterface object to interface with
Returns:
True if the put succeeded, False if the put failed due to update conflict

put

public boolean put(PutAction putAction,
                   PutActionModifier putActionModifier)
Execute the put on HBase, invoking the putModifier before executing the put if putModifier is not null. Any PutModifers registered with registerPutModifier will be invoked after the putModifier passed to this method is invoked, and before the Put is executed.

Parameters:
putAction - The PutAction to execute on HBase.
putActionModifier - Invoked before the Put to give callers a chance to modify the Put before it is executed.
Returns:
True if the put succeeded, False if the put failed due to update conflict

put

public <K,E> boolean put(K key,
                         E entity,
                         EntityMapper<K,E> entityMapper)
Execute a Put on HBase, creating the Put by mapping the key and entity to a Put with the entityMapper. Any PutModifers registered with registerPutModifier will be invoked before the Put is executed.

Parameters:
key - The Key to map to a Put with the entityMapper.
entity - The entity to map to a Put with the entityMapper.
entityMapper - The EntityMapper to map the key and entity to a put.
Returns:
True if the put succeeded, False if the put failed due to update conflict

put

public <K,E> boolean put(K key,
                         E entity,
                         PutActionModifier putActionModifier,
                         EntityMapper<K,E> entityMapper)
Execute a Put on HBase, creating the Put by mapping the key and entity to a Put with the entityMapper. putModifier will be invoked on this created Put before the Put is executed. Any PutModifers registered with registerPutModifier will be invoked after the putModifier passed to this method is invoked, and before the Put is executed.

Parameters:
key - The Key to map to a Put with the entityMapper.
entity - The entity to map to a Put with the entityMapper.
putActionModifier - Invoked before the Put to give callers a chance to modify the Put before it is executed.
entityMapper - The EntityMapper to map the key and entity to a put.
Returns:
True if the put succeeded, False if the put failed due to update conflict

increment

public <K,E> long increment(K key,
                            String fieldName,
                            long amount,
                            EntityMapper<K,E> entityMapper)
Execute an increment on an entity field. This field must be a type that supports increments. Returns the new increment value of type long.

Parameters:
key - The key to map to an Increment
fieldName - The name of the field we are incrementing
amount - The amount to increment by
entityMapper - The EntityMapper to map the key and increment amount to an Increment.
Returns:
The new field amount after the increment.

delete

public boolean delete(DeleteAction deleteAction)
Execute a Delete on HBase. Any DeleteActionModifers registered with registerDeleteModifier will be invoked before the Delete is executed.

Parameters:
deleteAction - The delete to execute on HBase.
Returns:
True if the delete succeeded, False if the put failed due to update conflict

delete

public boolean delete(DeleteAction deleteAction,
                      DeleteActionModifier deleteActionModifier)
Execute the delete on HBase, invoking the deleteModifier before executing the delete if deleteModifier is not null. Any DeleteActionModifers registered with registerDeleteModifier will be invoked after the deleteActionModifier passed to this method is invoked, and before the Delete is executed.

Parameters:
deleteAction - The Delete to execute.
deleteActionModifier - Invoked before the Delete to give callers a chance to modify the Delete before it is executed.
Returns:
True if the delete succeeded, False if the put failed due to update conflict

delete

public <K> boolean delete(K key,
                          Set<String> columns,
                          VersionCheckAction checkAction,
                          KeySerDe<K> keySerDe)
Execute a Delete on HBase, creating the Delete from the key, and the set of columns. Only the columns specified in this set will be deleted in the row. Any DeleteActionModifers registered with registerDeleteModifier will be invoked before the Delete is executed.

Parameters:
key - The Key to map to a Put with the entityMapper.
columns - The set of columns to delete from the row.
checkAction - A VersionCheckAction that will force this delete to do a checkAndDelete against a version count in the row
Returns:
True if the delete succeeded, False if the put failed due to update conflict

delete

public <K> boolean delete(K key,
                          Set<String> columns,
                          VersionCheckAction checkAction,
                          DeleteActionModifier deleteActionModifier,
                          KeySerDe<K> keySerDe)
Execute a Delete on HBase, creating the Delete from the key, and the set of columns. Only the columns specified in this set will be deleted in the row. deleteModifier will be invoked on this created Delete before the Delete is executed. Any DeleteActionModifers registered with registerDeleteActionModifier will be invoked after the deleteActionModifier passed to this method is invoked, and before the Delete is executed.

Parameters:
key - The Key to map to a Put with the entityMapper.
columns - The set of columns to delete from the row.
checkAction - A VersionCheckAction that will force this delete to do a checkAndDelete against a version count in the row
deleteActionModifier - Invoked before the Delete to give callers a chance to modify the Delete before it is executed.
Returns:
True if the delete succeeded, False if the put failed due to update conflict

getScannerBuilder

public <K,E> EntityScannerBuilder<K,E> getScannerBuilder(EntityMapper<K,E> entityMapper)
Refactored the key subsystem by removing the "Key" wrapper type, Get an EntityScannerBuilder that the client can use to build an EntityScanner.

Parameters:
entityMapper - The EntityMapper to use to map rows to entities.
Returns:
The EntityScannerBuilder
